result.title: Publication of Open Research Data
result.description: Publication of selected data on the XSPERINSE website and Zenodo repository in support of the EC ORD pilot The data can only be published if publication does not affect the partners ability to protect the project developments and publication of selected data requires approval by the Steering Committee This activity ties into deliverables D2 D12 D3 D21 D4 D22 and D5 D23 respectively
